about_the_game:
Microscopic Book

This Microscopic book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Images are things under the microscope!

Put on your lab coat and discover what things look like up close!

Contents

The Microscopic book unlocks the following images:
  • Microscope - 49x66
  • Tardigrade - 51x31
  • Shark Skin - 80x60
  • Sand Grains - 92x62
  • Salt Grains - 99x137
  • Plant Cell - 112x87
  • Tilia Stem - 114x114
  • Grass Cells - 117x138
  • Ant - 118x103
  • Horsetail Stem - 120x116
  • Blood Cells - 122x82
  • Spirilla Material - 122x87
  • Lilly Flower Bud - 137x130
  • Sloth Fur - 141x110
  • Silk Moth - 162x122
  • Sewing Needle Art - 167x32
  • Bacteria and Infections - 170x23
  • Soap Film - 180x130
  • Screen Pixels - 190x190
  • Snow Shards - 293x54
